pkgmetadata.longdescription: inline======.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/manicmaniac/inline/master.svg :target: https://travis-ci.org/manicmaniac/inline :alt: Travis CI.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/inline.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/inline :alt: PyPI Version.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/inline.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/inline :alt: Python VersionsEmbed inline C / C++ source codes in Python.Usage-----.. code:: python import inline c = inline.c(r''' int add(int a, int b) { return a + b; } ''') c.add(40, 2).. code:: python import inline cxx = inline.cxx(r''' extern "C" { int add(int a, int b) { return a + b; } } ''') cxx.add(40, 2)Install-------.. code:: sh pip install inline.. code:: sh git clone https://github.com/manicmaniac/inline.git cd inline python setup.py install
